name: Future Fusion
text: Reveal 1 Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck and send the Fusion Materials from your Deck to the Graveyard for that Fusion Monster. During your 2nd Standby Phase after this card's activation, Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster of the same name from your Extra Deck and target it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy that target. When that target is destroyed, destroy this card.
